name: CREAM
description:
4/30/2019

* Fixed a typo.

4/29/2019
* I removed the in-game cursor so that it works with just the regular desktop cursor. The original in-game cursor will have bugs like disappearing on occasion.

You've just recently gained one billion dollars out of the blue. Even though you have more money than most people, you still have to pay off your bills.

The title of the game is from the song "C.R.E.A.M." by Wu-Tang Clan.

The game has 18 payment bills (or levels) and it should take at least 10 minutes to complete.

Controls:
* You need the mouse to click on the UI buttons.

Tools Used:
* Unity
* GIMP
* Audacity

Audio:
* https://freesound.org/people/klankbeeld/sounds/400635/
* http://soundbible.com/1997-Cha-Ching-Register.html
* https://www.bfxr.net/
